snippet.title: A-TECH CYBERNETIC VR STORY TRAILER | Oculus Rift | HTC Vive | WMR
snippet.description:
A-Tech Cybernetic is a virtual reality sci-fi FPS for the Oculus Rift, HTC Vice and WMR, developed by XREAL Games, featuring two game modes, a wide array of weapons, immersive gameplay and graphics that push the boundaries of VR hardware.


The year is 2174, most of the solar system is colonized. A retired elite soldier arrives on asteriod PX923 to sort out a situation that got outta hand with the Body Templates at A-Tech Cybernetics. Accidentally downloaded into the body of a scientist working at the station, he needs to get to the bottom of the mystery, escape the Template infested facility and eliminate all hostiles to fulfill his contract. Step in his shoes and uncover the secrets of A-Tech. This is going to be one hell of a ride!

Follow us!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/XREALGamesVR/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/XREALGames
